author: ghudson
msg: In the fs-abstraction branch, declare and link up the vtables to let
the FS loader find the right functions to get work done.  Move code
around so that static functions are defined before they're used.
* libsvn_fs_base/tree.c
(root_vtable): Define.
(make_root): Move later and set up root vtable.
(make_revision_root, make_txn_root): Also move later, because we may
want to assigning separate vtables for txn and rev roots later.
(base_dir_entries): Move earlier for deltify_mutable.
(svn_fs_commit_txn, svn_file_md5_checksum): Whoops, slipped the net
earlier.  Rename to svn_fs_base__commit_txn and
base_file_md5_checksum.
(history_vtable): Define.
(assemble_history): Move later and set up history vtable.
* libsvn_fs_base/tree.h
(svn_fs_base__commit_txn): Declare.
* libsvn_fs_base/fs.c
(fs_vtable): Define.
(base_create, base_open): Set up fs object vtable.
(base_hotcopy): Move later in file, after base_bdb_recover and
base_bdb_logfiles.
* libsvn_fs/revs-txns.c:
(txn_vtable): Define.
(make_txn): Set up txn vtable.

author: ghudson
msg: In the fs-abstraction branch, rename the functions which implement the
FS API so that they can be used in vtables.  Also, avoid consuming the
public FS API except for the node-rev-ID functions.
This change results in some compiler warnings, which will be fixed up
by code reordering and vtable definition in a later commit.
* libsvn_fs_base/tree.c,
libsvn_fs_base/fs.c,
libsvn_fs_base/uuid.c,
libsvn_fs_base/revs-txns.c:
Make above-mentioned changes.
* libsvn_fs_base/tree.h,
libsvn_fs_base/uuid.h,
libsvn_fs_base/revs-txns.h:
Declare vtable function implementations for fs and txn vtables.

author: ghudson
msg: In the fs-abstraction branch, fix some problems with the vtables.
* libsvn_fs/fs_loader.h
(fs_vtable_t): set_warning_func and get_path are generic; remove
them.
(node_vtable_t): copied_from is a generic node function, and rename
is not currently part of the FS API.

author: jpieper
msg: Fix several cases of not clearing error messages in FSFS as pointed
out by ghudson, and use APR_STATUS_IS_EOF as pointed out by rooneg.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/fs_fs.c
(svn_fs__fs_get_node_revision, read_change, svn_fs__fs_purge_txn):
Clear the error message before ignoring it.
(read_change): Use APR_STATUS_IS_EOF to check for the EOF
condition.

author: jpieper
msg: Fix several bugs in FSFS that were revealed by finally running
fs-test.  Currently, of the applicable tests, only the large file test
fails.  There were three classes of fixes here:  first is better error
handling, second are fixes to handle the 'reset' case introduced by
undelete_change, and third are pool lifetime issues to fix unbounded
file handle creation and return objects being allocated in subpools.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/fs_fs.c
(svn_fs__fs_get_node_revision): Check the error code returned from
the file opens, and return the correct error code if the
node-revision is not found.  Also, close the node-revision file
when we are done with it.
(struct rep_read_baton): Add a new pool parameter that is used to
allocate data persistant to the entire stream read.
(rep_read_get_baton): Allocate the new pool, and pass it to
build_rep_list.
(rep_read_contents_close): New, frees both pools associated with a
representation read.
(get_representation_at_offset): Set the stream close handler.
(read_change): Correctly identify end of file conditions.
(svn_fs__fs_purge_txn): Return transaction not mutable if the
transaction directory is not found.
(svn_fs__fs_add_change): Special case the 'reset' type so that a
sensible value is written for the node-id.
(struct rep_write_baton): Add a new pool parameter that records the
passed in pool, so that the final representation can be allocated
from it.
(rep_write_get_baton): Swith the pools around so that parent_pool is
set to our caller pool, and all other allocations are done in the
subpool.
(rep_write_contents_close): Allocate the new representation
structure from our parent pool.
(write_final_changed_path_info): Special case the 'reset' handler to
not attempt to parse the bogus node-id.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/revs-txns.c
(svn_fs_change_rev_prop): Check the validity of the filesystem
before trying to set the property.
